Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2011...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cleveland on 3/2/2014 (Going to PIT: 2B R. Weeks, 3B A. Littlejohn, P J. Lester, P R. Perry. Going to CLE: 3B J. Arias, 3B R. Shaffer, P D. Bundy, P B. Halsey)...
Earned first career win on 9/17/2014...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 7/7/2020 (Going to CHN: P I. Kennedy, P D. Bundy. Going to CLE: CF H. Walker Jr., P R. Miller, P M. Talbot, P A. Roush)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/10/2021, off Allen Sothoron Jr. (NYN)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2022, going 3-1, 1.03...
Hit first career homerun on 5/30/2023, off Bill Swift Jr. (TOR)...
